Cyclone Gabrielle survivors in Hawke’s Bay still on hunt for homes a year after floods https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/cyclone-gabrielle-survivors-still-on-hunt-for-a-home-year-after-the-floods/3BQLAH3PABCBRNIA2R6WKZFPRY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/cyclone-gabrielle-survivors-still-on-hunt-for-a-home-year-after-the-floods/3BQLAH3PABCBRNIA2R6WKZFPRY/ Gary Hamilton-Irvine'Every time it rained I put headphones on and listened to 'Here Comes the Sun'.' Tue, 13 Feb 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Vivian Bell (right) and mum Shirley Galyer are still on the hunt for a permanent home. They survived the floods at their old property in Eskdale (pictured) along with family members (from left) Steven and Phillip Galyer and Alex Bell. Photo / Paul Taylor
